import { DefaultTheme } from "styled-components";

export const lightTheme: DefaultTheme = {
  textColor: "black",
  bgColor: "white",
  bgContainerColor: "white",
  headerColor: "#FFFFFF",
  activeColor: "#0095F6",
  inactiveColor: "#B2DFFC",
  textBoldColor: "#979797",
  borderColor: "#DBDBDB",
  inputBgColor: "#F0F0F0",
  searchBgColor: "#efefef",
  hashtagColor: "#00376b",
  grayTextColor: "#8F8F8F",
  lightGrayTextColor: "rgb(199, 199, 199)",
  errorColor: "#ed4956",
  formMaxWidth: "350px",
  contentMaxWidth: "940px",
};

export const darkTheme: DefaultTheme = {
  textColor: "white",
  bgColor: "black",
  bgContainerColor: "black",
  headerColor: "rgb(14,14,14)",
  activeColor: "#0095F6",
  inactiveColor: "#B2DFFC",
  textBoldColor: "#979797",
  borderColor: "rgb(60,60,60)",
  inputBgColor: "#202020",
  searchBgColor: "black",
  hashtagColor: "#00376b",
  grayTextColor: "#8F8F8F",
  lightGrayTextColor: "rgb(199, 199, 199)",
  errorColor: "#ed4956",
  formMaxWidth: "350px",
  contentMaxWidth: "940px",
};
